title: FINAL BONDAGE CONTORTION: HYPER-REALISTIC HORROR HOTEL
description: "It's been three Days already with the same routine . . . allow them to handcuff her before opening the heavy metal door of her so called 'Storage' area . . . then bound once more by heavy metal pipes in the most Uncomfortable and Painful Positions . . . Even being a Professional Contortionist did Very Little to help lessen the Pain of these 8 to 10 hour long Positions . . . and it did Absolutely Nothing to Lessen her Confusion as to WTF was happening to her? Why is she here? Where is here? The one thing she did know for sure is how her Sarcasm, Both Verbal and Non-Verbal would be met with even more Pain and Punishments . . . as her own warm fresh Blood drips down the backs of her Naked Thighs . . . a Helpless Guest of Horror Hotel's Medieval Dungeon Torture Chamber . . . When the Owner of the Horror Hotel, heard of her Special Skills, she became an Object of Interest . . . Earning her a very Rare and Finally Comfortable Trip up-stairs . . . Soft Couch, Nicer Food, even Cookies & Milk . . . for the Full Grown Woman dressed and being Treated like a Sweat Little Girl . . . Some how that, didn't End well either as things only get Even Worse . . ." "As an Addition to My Planned "Hyper-Realistic Horror Hotel", things get a littler Darker and Bloodier then Normal . . . I like to see this Series as part of my 'Zatanna Xtra Dark' Stories. My Goal, with your Approval, is to share more about the Horror Hotel and its un-willing Customers, every few weeks . . ." Love Zatanna . . . Xtra Dark ; ) Contains Scenes of, but not limited to - Prolonged Bondage, BDSM, Distress, Torture, Sensory Deprivation, Burial, Blood, Possible Suffocation . . . Oh, and Sarcasm Backfiring in the Worst Possible Ways ; )
author: Zatanna Dark
